name: Teleportia
description: Teleportia is an immersive puzzle game that takes players on an exciting journey through a world of lasers and teleportation. Step into a captivating universe filled with mind-bending challenges that will put your strategic thinking and problem-solving skills to the test. In this unique adventure, your objective is to navigate through a series of intriguing puzzles, mastering the art of manipulating lasers and teleportation to overcome obstacles and achieve your goals.
